name: Crusaders
description: Lead a group of crusaders on a perilous journey to the Holy Land, capturing key cities and landmarks while avoiding attrition from battles, disease, and supply shortages. Establish a lasting Christian presence in the heart of the 13th century European world.

name: Samurai
description: Lead a group of samurai loyal to your clan in feudal Japan, striving to establish dominance over rival clans and unify the nation under your rule. Balance strategic warfare, diplomacy, and resource management in the diverse landscape of 13th century Asian history.

name: Sahara
description: Navigate the vast Sahara Desert in the 13th century African world, leading a caravan of traders and explorers. Connect trade routes, establish alliances with desert tribes, and discover valuable resources to ensure survival and create a flourishing trading network.

name: Inca
description: Embark on an expedition deep into the heart of the Inca Empire, uncovering hidden cities, forging alliances with local tribes, and acquiring precious resources. Bridge the gap between your world and the marvels of the 13th century South American Inca civilization.
